effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 868,139 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 340,829.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
